title: Looking for team or to make a team!
body:
hey summoners,

im looking to make a 5's team or if anyone has a team i could join. im currently silver, but ive played since BETA ive also got a lot of mates who are in Diamond and Plat.

I main Support and Jungle, I also play top and average at Mid. My weakest lane is ADC.

I can play most champions for each role, But i really main Leona.

my in game name is ciaô add me or post in here.

thank you :)

replies.body:
Silv5 mid/support main. if not jg. weakest role adc IGN: Evaviera wanting to try something diff hopefully you get back to me so we can play some team ranked  ^_^
Mid main: ahri
Sup main: morg
average range in champs

Well I want to play 5s for the ward icon, gold atm, main Nami supp but also jng.

I have a friend who can play anywhere who said he'd help if I ever need a fifth too.
sweet if you and your friend join, that makes 4 of us we then just need 1 more

ID: Raito
prefer mid or top
GOLD 5 lokking for a team for any team rank
